meanings.sent1: My bro and I share a room.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my bro.
meanings.sent3: My bro always steals my snacks!
meanings.sent4: He is like a rock, my bro, always there for me.
meanings.sent5: My bro is my best friend and confidant.

meanings.sent1: Hey bro, wanna hang out later?
meanings.sent2: My bro always has my back.
meanings.sent3: My bro tells the worst jokes, but they crack me up.
meanings.sent4: She's my bro, my partner in crime.
meanings.sent5: Having a loyal bro makes life more fun.

meanings.sent1: Check out that cool bro over there!
meanings.sent3: My bro is always late to everything.
meanings.sent4: He's a chill bro, never gets stressed.
meanings.sent5: That bro is the life of the party.
